name: 陳炯曉
objective: 能源相關之基本科學原理，能源之應用及未來發展趨勢，非再生能源及再生能源概論，電力與動力系統簡介，能源的有效變換，能源管理，有效能源之解析與評估，能源之使用與環保問題。
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction. (Chapter 1)
Week 2. Energy Mechanics. (Chapter 2)
Week 3. Conservation of Energy. (Chapter 3)
Week 4. Heat and Work. (Chapter 4)
Week 5. Home Energy Conservation and Heat-Transfer Control. (Chapter 5)
Week 6. Solar Energy: Characteristics and Heating. (Chapter 6)
Week 7. Energy from Fossil Fuels. (Chapter 7)
Week 8. Air Pollution and Energy Use, Global Warming and Thermal Pollution. (Chapter 8&9)
Week 9. Mid-term Examination
Week 10. Electricity: Circuits and Superconductors. (Chapter 10)
Week 11. Electromagnetism and the Generation of Electricity. (Chapter 11)
Week 12. Electricity from Solar, Wind, and Hydro. (Chapter 12)
Week 13. The Building Blocks of Matter: (Chapter 13)
Week 14. Nuclear Power: Fission. (Chapter 14)
Week 15. Future Energy Alternatives: Fusion. (Chapter 16)
Week 16. Biomass: From Plants to Garbage. (Chapter 17)
Week 17. Tapping the Earth's Heat: Geothermal Energy. (Chapter 18)
Week 18. Final Examination
scorePolicy:
期中考及期末考各35%
報告 20%
上課情形 10%
materials: Roger A. Hinrichs and Merlin H. Kleinbach (2012) Energy: Its Use and the Environment, 5th Edn., Cengage Learning. 中文版由滄海圖書出版
